name: Run For Color
description:
You're a bunny-thing.  A robot maybe?  I dunno.  You got on this rainbow flying space treadmill somehow.  Whats with these floating TVs, and what's coming out of those tubes?  Different colored fruit things, those look tasty.  And bombs?!  Talk about taking the good with the bad.  Eating the fruit turns you, the bunny-thing, into that color.  Its a good idea to be in the same color track as you, and a VERY BAD idea to not be.  As a bunny-thing, you like to collect.  Collect 3 of each color in a row and good things happen to your score.  Whats a score you say?  We gotta keep some secrets to ourselves, but all I'll say is you HAVE TO GET THE TOP SCORE.

KNOWN ISSUES:

- Can run poorly in chrome.

- Can run poorly during +items event.

- Occasionally event title won't show.

- First gem/fruit thing gathered after dance time might be wrong color.
